main event: A civilian observed a nearly round white globe or balloon with a metal frame attached traveling from west to east, close to the ground, near Pinecastle AFB, Florida.
interesting points: The object was the same size as a B-17 aircraft., The sighting lasted for less than 1 minute., The observer reported that the object resembled a blue-green flying saucer., The object was in view for approximately 5-7 minutes prior to being out of range., Weather conditions included scattered clouds at 10,000 feet.
sighted object: a nearly round white globe or balloon
location: 12 miles SE of Pinecastle AFB, Florida, USA
